name: Maze Craz-E
description: If you’re looking for a challenging maze game that has level after level of mazes, then Maze Craz-E is for you! With 6 different levels, and over a hundred mazes per level, these maze puzzles will keep you busy for ages. With the levels progressing in difficulty as you work through them, you are guaranteed to never be bored. Start with easy mazes, then work your way up to bigger and more challenging mazes. Collect orbs as you go and use them for hints as the mazes get harder and harder.
